analysis.description:
simplelottery._finish (/unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol#101-126) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- developer.transfer(remain) (/unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol#115-116)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_contenders' of simplelottery.setBettingCondition (/unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol#35-37) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_bettingprice' of simplelottery.setBettingCondition (/unique_chucks/20/0x386771ba5705da638d889381471ec1025a824f53.sol#37) is not in mixedCase
